techmeme.title: Samsung reports Q4 revenue up 12% YoY to ~$52.2B, vs. ~$51.9B est., operating profit up 132% YoY to ~$4.5B, vs. ~$4.7B est., and FY 2024 revenue of ~$207B (Dylan Butts/CNBC)
Apple Q1: revenue up 4% YoY to $52.6B in the Americas, up 11% to $33.9B in Europe, up 16% to $9B in Japan, and up 1% to $10.3B in the rest of Asia-Pacific (Alkesh Sharma/The National)
Apple Services revenue reached an all-time high of $26.34B in Q1, up 14% YoY, beating estimates and helping lift the company's gross margin to a record 46.9% (CNBC)
Leaked all-hands: Mark Zuckerberg said Meta sold more than 1M Ray-Ban smart glasses in 2024, revealing sales figures for the first time (The Verge)
Tim Cook says there are now more than 2.35B active Apple devices worldwide, a new record, up from 2.2B devices the company reported in February 2024 (Juli Clover/MacRumors)
